statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_recall_information;
SELECT id, vehicle_make, recall_date FROM vehicle_recall_information WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_model, recall_description FROM vehicle_recall_information WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_recall_information ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recalls FROM vehicle_recall_information;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_recall_information ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC, recall_date DESC
SELECT id, vehicle_make, recall_description FROM vehicle_recall_information WHERE vehicle_model = 'Toyota'
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, COUNT(*) AS total_recalls FROM vehicle_recall_information GROUP BY vehicle_make, vehicle_model ORDER BY total_recalls DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_recall_information WHERE recall_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY recall_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_make FROM vehicle_recall_information
SELECT * FROM VehicleRecalls;
SELECT id, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM VehicleRecalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM RecallManufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_model, reason FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE vehicle_make = 'Ford' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE vehicle_make='Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, recall_date FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE recall_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM RecallManufacturers WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT id, reason FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRecalls INNER JOIN RecallManufacturers ON VehicleRecalls.id = RecallManufacturers.id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_recall_info;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle_recall_info WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model, recall_description FROM vehicle_recall_info WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM recalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM manufacturers;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers JOIN recalls ON manufacturers.manufacture_id = recalls.vehicle_id;
SELECT manufacturers.manufacturer_name, recalls.description FROM manufacturers INNER JOIN recalls ON manufacturers.manufacture_id = recalls.vehicle_id WHERE recalls.status = 'Active';
SELECT make, model, year, recall_description FROM vehicle_recall_info WHERE year >= 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT manufacturers.manufacturer_name, COUNT(recalls.recall_id) AS total_recalls FROM manufacturers LEFT JOIN recalls ON manufacturers.manufacture_id = recalls.vehicle_id GROUP BY manufacturers.manufacturer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT make FROM vehicle_recall_info WHERE make LIKE 'Toyota%';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_manufacturer;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM vehicle_manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_id FROM vehicle_model WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT recall_description, recall_date FROM vehicle_recall ORDER BY recall_date ASC;
SELECT model_name, recall_description FROM vehicle_model JOIN vehicle_recall ON vehicle_model.model_id = vehicle_recall.model_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, model_name FROM vehicle_manufacturer JOIN vehicle_model ON vehicle_manufacturer.manufacturer_id = vehicle_model.manufacturer_id WHERE manufacturer_name = 'Toyota';

SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(model_id) AS total_models FROM vehicle_manufacturer LEFT JOIN vehicle_model ON vehicle_manufacturer.manufacturer_id = vehicle_model.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name HAVING COUNT(model_id) > 1;
SELECT model_name, recall_description FROM vehicle_model JOIN vehicle_recall ON vehicle_model.model_id = vehicle_recall.model_id WHERE recall_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY recall_date ASC;

SELECT status_name, COUNT(recall_id) AS total_recalls FROM recall_status LEFT JOIN vehicle_recall ON recall_status.status_id = vehicle_recall.status_id GROUP BY status_name ORDER BY total_recalls DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRecalls;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE recall_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT description FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE manufacturer = 'Ford' AND model = 'Explorer';
SELECT reason, status FROM RecallReasons JOIN RecallStatus ON RecallReasons.id = RecallStatus.id;
SELECT location FROM RecallLocations WHERE recall_id = 3 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRecalls;
SELECT manufacturer, model, recall_date FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE manufacturer = 'Ford';
SELECT manufacturer, model, recall_date, description FROM VehicleRecalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT r.reason, rd.details, v.manufacturer FROM RecallReasons r JOIN RecallDetails rd ON r.id = rd.reason_id JOIN VehicleRecalls v ON rd.recall_id = v.id;
SELECT rl.location, v.manufacturer, v.model, rs.status FROM RecallLocations rl JOIN VehicleRecalls v ON rl.recall_id = v.id JOIN RecallStatus rs ON v.id = rs.id;
